      • getCrawlStorageFolder

        public String getCrawlStorageFolder()

      • setCrawlStorageFolder

        public void setCrawlStorageFolder(String crawlStorageFolder)
        The folder which will be used by crawler for storing the intermediate crawl data. The content of this folder should not be modified manually.
        Parameters:
        crawlStorageFolder - The folder for the crawler's storage

      • isResumableCrawling

        public boolean isResumableCrawling()

      • setResumableCrawling

        public void setResumableCrawling(boolean resumableCrawling)
        If this feature is enabled, you would be able to resume a previously stopped/crashed crawl. However, it makes crawling slightly slower
        Parameters:
        resumableCrawling - Should crawling be resumable between runs ?

      • getMaxDepthOfCrawling

        public int getMaxDepthOfCrawling()

      • setMaxDepthOfCrawling

        public void setMaxDepthOfCrawling(int maxDepthOfCrawling)
        Maximum depth of crawling For unlimited depth this parameter should be set to -1
        Parameters:
        maxDepthOfCrawling - Depth of crawling (all links on current page = depth of 1)

      • getMaxPagesToFetch

        public int getMaxPagesToFetch()

      • setMaxPagesToFetch

        public void setMaxPagesToFetch(int maxPagesToFetch)
        Maximum number of pages to fetch For unlimited number of pages, this parameter should be set to -1
        Parameters:
        maxPagesToFetch - How many pages to fetch from all threads together ?

      • getUserAgentString

        public String getUserAgentString()
        Returns:
        userAgentString

      • setUserAgentString

        public void setUserAgentString(String userAgentString)
        user-agent string that is used for representing your crawler to web servers. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_agent for more details
        Parameters:
        userAgentString - Custom userAgent string to use as your crawler's identifier

      • setOnlineTldListUpdate

        public void setOnlineTldListUpdate(boolean online)
        Should the TLD list be updated automatically on each run? Alternatively, it can be loaded from the embedded tld-names.txt resource file that was obtained from https://publicsuffix.org/list/effective_tld_names.dat
